title: Language Education Curriculum Utilizing Synergy Between Learning Design and Analytics in [Large-Scale] Contexts

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in fundamental language skills (reading, writing, listening, speaking)
context.additional_context: Need for content structured optimally for smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three educational strategies combining learning design (LD) principles and data analysis techniques (LA)
Learners can interpret individual language learning patterns with over 80% accuracy using learning analytics tools
Learners can improve language proficiency by over 20% through personalized learning plans informed by analysis results
Learners achieve 90% project completion rates utilizing peer feedback in collaborative learning environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
